description: Erection of part two, part five-storey over lower ground floor level rear extensions, plus alterations to elevations in association with provision of additional Class B1 office space and flexible Class B1/Class A1 (office/showroom) space at lower levels, plus erection of two-storey roof extension to provide nine residential units.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed development, by reason of its failure to provide an adequate number of residential units where there is capacity to do so, or to make any provision for affordable housing, represents an inefficient use of this highly accessible site contrary to policies Imp6 (Efficient use) and H14 (Dwelling mix, dwelling need and affordable housing) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002, policies 3A.2 (Borough housing targets), 3A.3 (Maximising the potential of sites), 3A.5 (Housing choice), 3A.9 (Affordable housing targets), 3A.10 (Negotiating affordable housing in individual private residential and mixed-use schemes), 3A.11 (Affordable housing thresholds) and 4B.1 (Design principles for a compact city) of the London Plan (consolidated with Alterations since 2004) and strategic policy 12 (Meeting the housing challenge) of the Islington Core Strategy Draft Submission Document 2010.
